Sentencas: The deregulation and unbundling of electricity markets in many countries worldwide bring new perspectives for fuel cells.
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement

Sentencas: The connection between the fuel cell and the load is through an inverter using pulse width modulation (PWM).
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement

Sentencas: This paper presents a new flux modulation approach for the closed-loop control of the output voltage of inverters for fuel cell power plants.
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement

Sentencas: A fuzzy logic control is proposed for this PWM converter and the fuzzy scaling factors are optimized by using genetic algorithms.
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement

Sentencas: The proposed control scheme can achieve fast transient responses and, at the same time, have low total harmonic distortion in output current during steady-state operation.
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement

Sentencas: This genetic fuzzy controller demonstrates improved response than conventional flux vector method.
Titulo: Genetic fuzzy control applied to the inverter of solid oxide fuel cell for power quality improvement
